snippet: Coach Tom Coughlin insisted that preparation for Sunday’s game against Pittsburgh would not be disrupted, even though many players’ homes remained without power.
abstract: New York Giants coach Tom Coughlin insists that preparation for game against Pittsburgh Steelers will not be disrupted, despite players still dealing with aftermath of Hurricane Sandy.
lead_paragraph: Coach Tom Coughlin insisted that preparation for Sunday’s game against Pittsburgh would not be disrupted, even though many players’ homes remained without power.

headline.seo: Back at Practice, Giants Shift Focus From Storm to Steelers
headline.main: Giants Shift Focus From Storm to Steelers
headline.print_headline: Giants Shift Focus From Storm to Steelers
